issues.description: The Person model fields (id, firstName, lastName, birthday) are declared private in the template (and per the UML in the problem statement) but public in the solution. This visibility mismatch breaks encapsulation and conflicts with the intended design, potentially confusing students about field access.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the Person model fields private in the solution (keeping the existing getters/setters) so that they match the template and UML specification.
